profile.summary: Sean Carroll's podcast, Mindscape, offers in-depth discussions on a wide range of topics, primarily focusing on physics, cosmology, and philosophy of science, but also including economics, brain science, and social issues. The channel features interviews with experts and solo episodes, aiming to explore complex ideas in an accessible and engaging manner for a highly educated audience.
